name.baseName: Tire production;Blended compound;Cutting and forming; Fiber fabric,Steel fabric
轮胎生产;混合化合物;切割和成型;纤维织物，钢织物

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the production stage is quite complex andincludes the processes of compound blending, rolling, extrusion, packet ring production, cutting and forming, vulcanizing, and testing. We combined closely related processes toavoid allocation. The following four main production processes were identified: compound blending, rolling and extrusion,cutting and forming, and vulcanizing and testin
生产阶段相当复杂，包括复合共混、轧制、挤出、包环生产、切割成型、硫化和测试等工艺。我们将密切相关的流程与避免分配。确定了以下四种主要生产工艺：复合共混、轧制和挤出，切割成型，硫化成型。

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: “Data collected onsite in 2014 by one of the largest Chinese tire companies were used in the assessment. ”The article has stated that the data is related to 2014, but there is no specific time, so the time is set on January 1, 2014.
”评估中使用了中国最大的轮胎公司之一在2014年现场收集的数据“。文章中已说明数据调研与2014年，但没有具体时间，所以该时间定位2014年1月1日。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The detailed LCA data set pertains to the complex process of tire production in the industrial sector. It is particularly applicable to manufacturing practices involving compound blending, rolling and extrusion, cutting and forming, vulcanization, and testing. These processes are integral in producing tires equipped with fiber and steel fabrics for automotive vehicles. The product resulting from these processes is used extensively in the automotive industry for a variety of vehicles, delivering essential performance and safety features.
该生命周期评估数据集详细说明了工业领域轮胎生产的复杂过程。此数据特别适用于含有复合共混、轧制和挤出、切割成型、硫化和测试等制造实践的生产过程。这些过程是生产配备有纤维和钢织物的汽车车辆轮胎的不可或缺的部分。这些流程产出的产品在汽车工业中得到广泛应用，为各种车辆提供重要的性能和安全特性。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data on the raw materials used in the investigated tire product were sourced from on-site investigations of one of the largest Chinese tire companies. The data were collected in 2014 during the manufacture of the target tire product.Other materials, such as active clay, zinc oxide, stearic acid, processing agent, and lubricating oil, were also considered.Life cycle background data on these other materials were obtained from the global average LCI data of Ecoinvent 3.0
调查轮胎产品中使用的原材料数据来源于中国最大轮胎公司之一的现场调查。这些数据是在2014年目标轮胎产品制造期间收集的。还考虑了其他材料，如活性粘土、氧化锌、硬脂酸、加工剂和润滑油。这些其他材料的生命周期背景数据来自Ecoinvent 3.0的全球平均LCI数据

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Sun X, Liu J, Hong J, et al. Life cycle assessment of Chinese radial passenger vehicle tire[J]. The International Journal of Life Cycle Assessment, 2016, 21: 1749-1758.
Sun X, Liu J, Hong J, et al. Life cycle assessment of Chinese radial passenger vehicle tire[J]. The International Journal of Life Cycle Assessment, 2016, 21: 1749-1758.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this LCA data, users should note that the dataset represents processes closely related to tire production, and therefore allocation has been avoided by combining relevant procedures. The provided data were collected on site in 2014 by a major Chinese tire manufacturer, and only pertains to activities conducted within that year. Background data for secondary materials such as active clay, zinc oxide, stearic acid, processing agents, and lubricating oil are sourced from the global average of Ecoinvent 3.0 LCI datasets. It is imperative that users not extrapolate this date-set to other time periods without appropriate adjustments for technological changes and market variations.
在使用此生命周期评估数据时，用户需注意该数据集表示与轮胎生产密切相关的流程，因此通过结合相关程序避免了分摊。提供的数据由中国主要轮胎制造商于2014年现场收集，并且仅涉及当年的活动。如活性粘土、氧化锌、硬脂酸、加工剂和润滑油等次要材料的背景数据来源于Ecoinvent 3.0全球平均LCI数据集。重要的是，用户不应在不进行技术变化和市场变动适当调整的情况下，将此数据集外推至其他时间周期。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Waste wire cord fabric,Waste steel wire
Waste wire cord fabric,Waste steel wire
